title: REQUEST: Support for connection presets
author: Russssty
body_snippet:
**Basic use case:**

As a user I have a different needs for sessions depending on type of task I planning to do.

- For the task A I will need a connection to server 1, server 2 and client 1
- For the task B I will need a connection to server 2 and clients 1-10.

I don't want to open all the connections manually every time.

I want to be able to save the open connections as a preset, so I can initiate/open them next time just by one click.
The presets should be listed in the "Presets" ...
